function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Centralized A/C systems operating all day long and throughout the summer season","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor air contamination and spread of airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of A/C systems, proper ventilation, and use of air purifiers","Technologies":"Air purifiers, smart HVAC systems with air quality monitoring","People":"Occupants, residents","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers"},{"Description":"Inability to control A/C unit cycles based on weather conditions","Impact":"Potential for indoor humidity and temperature fluctuations, leading to mold growth and discomfort","Mitigation":"Installation of smart HVAC systems with weather-responsive controls, use of dehumidifiers","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, dehumidifiers","People":"Occupants, residents","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers"},{"Description":"Default A/C settings leading to high electricity consumption","Impact":"Increased energy costs and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Education on energy-efficient A/C usage, installation of energy-efficient A/C units","Technologies":"Energy-efficient A/C units, smart energy management systems","People":"Occupants, residents","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers"}]}
